name: (DOWNLOADABLE FOR CHROMEBOOK) Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Tricky for Switch/Fnfr
name_original: (DOWNLOADABLE FOR CHROMEBOOK) Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Tricky for Switch/Fnfr
description:
PROBLEMS:

No  cutscenes, as they are in webm format, which cannot be opened by love2d

No kill/fire notes (some would see this as an enhancement lmao)

ADDITIONS:

added FGJK control scheme

added ZXNM control scheme

added ZX,. control scheme

added ZX23 control scheme

note: all of these controls are already active once you start the game
